txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but enemies still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'The Huorn, Rottenheart, is an uncontrollable force of nature, and a danger to all that dwell within Balewood. Go there, and show it that Wildermore will endure!'
You have defeated Rottenheart and granted a small degree of peace to Balewood.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but enemies persist throughout much of Wildermore. The Huorn, Rottenheart, is an unruly force in Balewood beyond Leaflock's control.
Rottenheart can be found in south-western Balewood atop a snowy hill.\n\nThe Huorn, Rottenheart, is an uncontrollable force of nature, and a danger to all that dwell within Balewood.
The Huorn, Rottenheart, is an uncontrollable force of nature, and a danger to all that dwell within Balewood.
